###Function###
SoundPlay

###Description###
播放指定的音频文件.

###Syntax###
SoundPlay ( "文件名" [, 延迟] )


###Parameters###
@@ParamTable@@
文件名
	要播放的音频文件名(一般是 WAV 或 MP3 格式)
延迟
	[可选参数] 此标志参数用以决定是否等待音频文件被播放完毕才继续执行其下语句:
	1 = 等待音频文件播放完
	0 = 在播放音频文件的同时继续执行后面的语句(默认)
@@End@@

###ReturnValue###
None.  (无论成功与否总是返回 1.)


###Remarks###
脚本程序终止时将停止播放音频文件(如果仍在播放中的话).
Calling SoundPlay("") can be used to stop a currently playing sound.  This has the side effect of also closing the open handle.
If you need to delete a sound file which you have played in the script, you should call SoundPlay("") first to ensure the handle is closed.


###Related###
SoundSetWaveVolume
